channel.title: Stop Fake on AFUO - СУОА
channel.description: Recent content in Stop Fake on AFUO - СУОА

item.title: Canberra Times Publishes AFUO Protest to Russian Ambassador's Paid Ad.
item.description: Unacceptable ad At a time when Australia and the international community has joined in condemning the seizure of Ukrainian naval personnel and their vessels and reaffirmed world support for Ukraine’s sovereignty and integrity, it is unacceptable for an Australian newspaper to carry a paid advertisement from Russia defending what are currently disputed war crimes (The Canberra Times, December 21, p15). The advertisement mocks the international findings that a Russian missile downed Malaysia Airlines flight MH17, killing 298 innocent souls including 38 Australians.
